name: The Cube (itch) (casualdutchman)
description:
Roam the endless world in search for orbs for the Cube. Grab the orb and feed it the Cube!

[WASD] Move
{SPACE] Jump
{E} Pickup Cube of orb
{ESC] pause menu

This project did not have the focus on creating a game. The focus was on experimenting with Unity’s HD render pipeline. I am aware that there is minimal sound in the game and that the gameplay isn’t too interesting. The interesting part of this game is to explore the endless terrain and find great views.
